abstract_summ: A total of 179 patients with COVID-19 pneumonia (97 male and 82 female) were included in the present prospective study, of whom 21 died . Age, preexisting concurrent cardiovascular or cerebrovascular diseases, CD3(+)CD8(+) T cells ≤75 cell·μL(−1) and cardiac troponin I≥0.05 ng·mL(+1) were predictors for high mortality of patients .
